features: 💎【Screen Protector Compatible with iPhone 15 Pro Max 6.7"】 Specially designed ONLY for iPhone 15 Pro Max 6.7". Not compatible with any other iPhone models.

💎【Ultra-Fast Installation, Auto-Alignment in 30 seconds!】 Installing a screen protector might seem like a headache, but our product is equipped with an automatic alignment kit for a fast installation in just 30 seconds! Say goodbye to the hassle of manual alignment.

💎【Indestructible Ultra 9H Glass for Ultimate Protection】Our tempered glass leads the market with Ultra-high 9H hardness for maximum resistance against impacts and scratches from objects. No matter you’re daily routine, your phone is safely protected. Give your device that extra layer of sturdy protection it deserves!

💎【Anti-Fingerprint Resistance for a Cleaner Screen】Annoyed by fingerprints? Our screen protector comes with a transparent layer that is hydrophobic and oil repellent. After testing, they effectively prevented 99.99% of fingerprints caused by sweat and oil stains.

💎【Ultra-Clear and Ultra-Sensitive】Our screen protector uses high-quality materials and advanced coating technology to provide a clear, visual experience, ensuring smooth screen touching and sensitive response. Whether swiping, tapping or gaming, you can enjoy a seamless experience without delay or lag.

Does it affect touch screen capability? No, it does not. The screen protector is made of ultra-thin 0.33mm tempered glass, which not only protects your screen, but also does not affect touch screen sensitivity. The protector provides a smooth surface like the original phone screen. Is this screen protector compatible with an Otter Box case? Yes, our screen protector is compatible with most cases. There is approximately 1 mm of space between the screen protector and the edge of the case. What should I do if I receive the screen protector used in an open box? Sometimes mistakenly sends used products. If you encounter this situation, please ask us and we will send you a new one. Do I need to install the screen protector into the tray just as other brands do? No! Our screen protector comes preset in the alignment tray. Simply align the tray frame on your phone, swipe down the middle, and done! Are the edges of the glass square or rounded? It has rounded edges, tapers down, and blends in seamlessly. It’s super easy to install and provides full coverage. This is the screen protector you’ve been looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flawless Protection: amFilm Screen and Lens Protector for iPhone 15 Pro Max
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the amFilm Screen Protector and Lens Protector for my iPhone 15 Pro Max. As someone who consistently relies on amFilm for all my devices, from iPhones to iPads and even consoles, I had high expectations for this product. Once again, amFilm did not disappoint.What stands out about this screen protector is its exceptional ease of installation. The auto-alignment feature works like a charm, ensuring a perfect, bubble-free application every time. This is a significant relief compared to the tedious adjustments often required with other screen protectors.The protection it offers is unparalleled. The tempered glass is tough enough to guard against scratches and minor impacts, preserving the condition of the phone's screen and lens. Additionally, the clarity it maintains is impressive. There's no compromise on the display quality or touch sensitivity.Each pack containing two protectors adds even more value to this product. It's reassuring to know that I have a backup available, especially considering the investment in these phones.I honestly couldn't find a single flaw with this product. It checks all the boxes for what I look for in a screen protector: ease of installation, clarity, protection, and value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flawless Protection with Effortless Installation!
reviews.reviewText: Title: Flawless Protection with Effortless Installation!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️I recently purchased the amFilm Easiest Installation OneTouch for iPhone 15 Pro Max screen protector, and I couldn't be happier with my decision! This product has not only provided exceptional protection for my device but has also lived up to its promise of the easiest installation process.From the moment I opened the package, I was impressed with the quality of the tempered glass and camera lens protector. The materials are sturdy, and the clarity of the glass does not compromise the stunning display of my iPhone 15 Pro Max.What truly sets this screen protector apart is the Auto-Alignment Technology. The installation process was a breeze, thanks to the precision of this feature. In just a few simple steps, I had the screen protector perfectly aligned with my phone's display. The OneTouch installation lives up to its name – it was genuinely hassle-free!One of my favorite aspects of this product is the bubble-free application. I've tried numerous screen protectors in the past, and getting rid of bubbles can be a frustrating experience. With the amFilm protector, I experienced zero issues. The protector adhered seamlessly to my phone's screen without a single bubble in sight.The camera lens protector is an added bonus, and I appreciate the thoughtful design that ensures a perfect alignment. It's great to know that both my screen and camera lens are well-protected without compromising the functionality or aesthetics of my device.Overall, the amFilm Easiest Installation OneTouch for iPhone 15 Pro Max is a fantastic investment for anyone looking to safeguard their device without the headache of a complicated installation process. I highly recommend this product to fellow iPhone users who value quality, ease of use, and top-notch protection for their devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This kit is the most comprehensive that I've ever seen for a screen protector. Everything was professionally packaged. The instructions are clear. Application was easy. The few bubbles were easily removed by slightly lifting the edge and wiping away using the included tool. Fitment is excellent, leaving about 1 mm all around between the screen protector edge and the Apple case. Hopefully the screen protector will prove to be durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Installation Guide Needs Improvement
reviews.reviewText: I've been using amFilm screen protectors since the iPhone 7 and they continue to provide good low cost protection. And the current installation guide frame is a great improvement over the old "hinge" method. But quality control is lacking regarding the frame's fit and protector placement.PROBLEMS1) As to protector placement, it is not well centered within the guide frame. Since its placement on the phone is relative to the frame, this misalignment is then transferred to the phone after installation. It’s not off by much, but since the screen protector barely covers the lit portion of the phone’s display, some color fringing may be visible along one of the top or side edges.2) As to fit, the guide frame is positioned and centered on the phone by plastic tabs on all four sides. These tabs slide along the sides of the phone when putting the guide frame on. The trouble is it fits too tightly when fully seated onto the phone. While they will flex to fit properly when enough pressure is applied, they may also scratch the side of your pristine new phone in the process.SOLUTIONS1) Regarding the protector placement, visually check the guide/protector assembly before installation. Look closely at the spacing between the outside edges of the screen protector and the inside surface of the frame’s alignment tabs. That spacing distance should be the same for each pair (8 in all) of opposing tabs. If not, you can realign the protector to the alignment frame. They are temporarily held together by small patches of adhesive at the four corners. Simply and slowly press the protector away from the frame towards the phone side of the guide being careful not to cause the front protective film to separate from the glass protector. You probably will only need to (and want to) do this at two corners at a time. That will keep the protector attached, but allow you to shift the protector enough to correct a slight misalignment. Pick the two corners next to whichever pair of tabs you’re trying to adjust.2) Regarding the guide frame, first test how snuggly it fits on your phone as-is. If it slips on easily up to its built-in stops and is fully seated, you don’t need to do anything. But if it only partially fits before requiring significant force to fully seat, stop and remove it. Grab the frame along opposing sides and “gently” twist and hold them for a few seconds in the directions that would move the tabs away from the phone. Do this for each pair of opposing tabs (side-to-side and top-to-bottom) to loosen the tight fit. Keep in mind it’s only plastic, so be careful not to break it. It will also tend to spring back to it’s original (tight) shape after a short while, so do this just before attempting to install it on your phone.If you’re not picky about your protector’s alignment, the alignment guide will do an adequate job out-of-the-box and probably not scratch your phone in the process. If you are, I hope this helps. But I also assume no responsibility for any damage my advice might cause to this product or your phone… do at your own risk.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple, util y fácil de instalar.
reviews.reviewText: He comprado esta marca los últimos años para diferentes equipos para mi y mi familia por su facilidad de instalación, el producto es bueno pero tener una instalación tan amigable es sin duda un extra importante. Sin duda lo volveré a comprar el día que cambie de equipo

Packaging is neat. Gives the feel of premium product. It's too easy to apply, you don't need to be a professional. Just keep the applicator and press the protector glass and you're done. As easy it is.

Such an amazing product. It comes with ALL the necessary items to install the screen protector and the camera protector. Super impressive. I am stunned by the quality of installation kit and the touch feel after installation. Its smoother than the original screen . Kudos for such a great product at such a great price . Loved it
Thanks for product innovation and ease of installation with proper hygiene
